page.title: 10PINHOE PRIMARY SCHOOLS.
page.content: The children that go to {Pinhoe First {School}are aged between 5 and 8.There are about 96 boys and girls.The School was built in the 1950's.The children start school at 9.00am and finish at 3.30pm. {St. Michael's Church of England Middle {School}is 11 years old and took over from the old Middle School which was knocked down and a telephone exchange now stands there.The old school was built in 1886.There is a stone from the old school in the grounds of the present school which has this date on it.The school is also used for church services.There are one hundred and fifty children from 8 to 12 years old.There are seven classes.School starts at 9.00am and finishes at 3.45pm.
